channel.description: Recent content on Mark Edmondson - Personal Blog

item.title: The Truth According to Me
item.description: I feel a need for a line in the sand on what I think is true. 1. The scientific method is the best way to obtain objective reality As defined by Popper, to differentiate between subjective and objective truths, a theory needs to make predictions that are verified by repeatable experiments. This method of enquiry is what science is founded upon, and lets us enjoy aeroplanes, TVs and computer chips.

item.title: Mark Edmondson Presentations
item.description: Presentation links Gathering in one place links to presentations I’ve made over the years. R at scale on the Google Cloud Platform - CopenhagenR, 2019-05-19 Man vs Machine - Superweek 2019 and Web Analytics Wednesday Copenhagen - 2019-02-01 #rstats lessons for #measure - Digital Analytics Congres, Utrecht. 2018-10-09 Beyond the Cloud with Digital Analytics - Web Analytics Wednesday Copenhagen. 2018-02-21 Is BigQuery the answer to all analytics prayers? - MeasureCamp Copenhagen.
